hints: datetime.date.today() gets today's date
datetime.datetime.now() gets current date and time
Subtract dates to get difference: (date1 - date2).days
random.choice(list) picks one item randomly
random.shuffle(list) shuffles list in place
random.sample(list, n) picks n items without repeats
json.dumps(dict) converts dictionary to JSON string
json.loads(string) converts JSON string to dictionary
Use json.dump(data, file) to save, json.load(file) to read
time.sleep(seconds) pauses the program
time.time() returns current time as a number
Measure duration: end_time - start_time gives seconds elapsed
math.sqrt(n) returns square root of n
math.floor() rounds down, math.ceil() rounds up
math.pi is the constant pi, math.pow(x, y) is x to power y
string.ascii_lowercase has all lowercase letters
Use .isalpha() to check if all characters are letters
Use .replace(old, new) to substitute text
os.getcwd() returns current working directory
os.path.exists(path) checks if file/folder exists
os.makedirs(path, exist_ok=True) creates folders safely
Counter(list) counts occurrences of each item
.most_common(n) returns the n most frequent items
Counters can be added together: counter1 + counter2
Create a .py file with functions, then import it
import module_name, then use module_name.function()
Define constants in your module as regular variables
